The usual NtR haters enjoy this kind of NtR or netori as they called it, where a weakass mc scored the chic because it shows cowardly individuals can actually achieve something, and that made them feel good about themselves. If you are of a mind then you would know how wrong this kind of shit is. NtR is fueled by seduction, if a pussy-ass of a character that cannot stand up to his bullies somehow manage to snatch the girl, then this world is fucked. Natural selection always make the girls choose the stronger male in competition as to provide them protection and satisfaction. That is why in NTR the so-called bad guys always win because they are strong-willed individuals irregardless of how evil they may be. Although in this case the bullies and the bullied are both pussies so it is a loss-loss situation to the girl whomever she will end up with. End of rant.

If you want a completely honest answer, sure hundreds of millions of sperm are shot, however they're at various stages of development and many of them have malformations. Only a portion are viable to MOVE let alone impregnate the woman. THEN a woman is only fertile about 3 days during her period, usually days 14-16 after her monthly bleeding. AND THEN, if the zygote produced has some sort of genetic mistake it usually gets discarded (downs syndrome with 3 chomosomes are outliers).

Statistically speaking a couple having unprotected 5-7 days a week for 6 months has about a 50% of getting pregnant, whereas a couple having unprotected sex like that for 1 year has about 80% of getting pregnant.
